name: Maven Infosoft
tag_list: ecommerce, web-design, web-development, software, application-development, hire-developer
overview:
Maven Infosoft is an established IT solutions company with an extensive project record in software products, application development, web design, e-commerce and a range of IT services. They are the first choice in the European market for outsourcing web-based application development using Microsoft and LAMP technologies.

Maven’s team of developers skilled in design, programming and testing. All projects are managed and executed to perfection at each stage of the software life cycle by a professional PMO. Experienced and industry-specialised analysts work round the clock with cultural coordinators to ensure success in offshore / on-site projects. Maven Infosoft has unparalleled expertise in .Net and PHP development and a zero down-time infrastructure in our development centre in Ahmedabad, India.
